task.title: Remove Language
task.shortdesc: Follow these steps to remove a language from a TMX file.

step.cmd: Open the TMX file that you want to modify.
In main menu, select Tasks Remove Language... option.
step.stepresult: The following dialog appears: Remove Language Dialog

step.cmd: Use the drop-down box to select the language to remove.

step.stepresult: The dialog closes and the editing window is refreshed to reflect the changes.
